995 class plQuery
996 {
997 public:
998  plQuery()
999  : variables()
1000  , discretized_variables(false)
1001  , dist()
1002  , compiled_dist()
1003  , cnd_dist()
1004  , compiled_response_as_probtable()
1005  , first_computation(true)
1006  , last_evidence()
1007  , compile_distribution(true)
1008  , invalidated_compiled_distribution(true)
1009  {}
1010 
1011  plQuery(const plVariablesConjunction &vars, bool compile_it)
1012  : variables(vars)
1013  , discretized_variables(vars.is_discretized())
1014  , dist()
1015  , compiled_dist()
1016  , cnd_dist()
1017  , compiled_response_as_probtable()
1018  , first_computation(true)
1019  , last_evidence()
1020  , compile_distribution(compile_it)
1021  , invalidated_compiled_distribution(true)
1022  {}
1023 
1024  plVariablesConjunction variables;
1025  bool discretized_variables;
1026  plDistribution dist;
1027  plDistribution compiled_dist;
1028  plCndDistribution cnd_dist;
1029  plProbTable compiled_response_as_probtable;
1030  bool first_computation;
1031  plValues last_evidence;
1032  bool compile_distribution;
1033  bool invalidated_compiled_distribution;
1034 };
1035 
1036 class plTimeSliceQuery : public plQuery
1037 {
1038 private:
1039  plTimeSliceQuery(const plTimeSliceQuery&);// NI
1040  plTimeSliceQuery& operator=(const plTimeSliceQuery&);// NI
1041 
1042 public:
1043  plTimeSliceQuery()
1044  : plQuery()
1045  , mutable_dist(0)
1046  , prec_variable()
1047  {}
1048 
1049  plTimeSliceQuery(const plSymbol &node_prec,
1050  const plSymbol &node_current,
1051  const plDistribution &init_dist)
1052  : plQuery(node_current, true)
1053  , mutable_dist(new plMutableDistribution( init_dist ) )
1054  , prec_variable(node_prec)
1055  {}
1056 
1057  plTimeSliceQuery(const plSymbol &node_prec,
1058  const plSymbol &node_current)
1059  : plQuery(node_current, true)
1060  , mutable_dist(0 )
1061  , prec_variable(node_prec)
1062  {}
1063 
1064  ~plTimeSliceQuery()
1065  {
1066  delete mutable_dist;
1067  }
1068 
1069  void set_mutable(plBayesianNetwork &bn)
1070  {
1071  assert( mutable_dist == 0 );
1072 
1073  mutable_dist = new plMutableDistribution( plDistribution(bn.get_node_distribution(prec_variable) ) );
1074 
1075  plLearnFrozenDistribution *frozen_l = new plLearnFrozenDistribution(*mutable_dist);
1076  bn.replace_distribution(prec_variable, frozen_l);
1077  }
1078 
1079  plMutableDistribution *mutable_dist;
1080  plSymbol prec_variable;
1081 };
